description.value: If a blight is slain within its cursed domain, its body melts into the surrounding environment and a new blight of the same type spontaneously forms in [[/gmr 1d10 #Days]] days at the cursed domain's epicenter unless the curse is removed before then. The new blight retains all the memories of the previous blight.

publication.title: Pathfinder #211: The Secret of Deathstalk Tower
